FuncDef:
The gvrp command enables GVRP globally.
The undo gvrp command disables GVRP globally.
By default, GVRP is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable GVRP, run the gvrp command in the system and interface views. After GVRP is enabled globally and on interfaces, a device can dynamically register or deregister VLANs on the GVRP interfaces.
Precautions
If the gvrp command is run in the system view, the command takes effect globally. If the gvrp command is run in an interface view, the command takes effect only on the interface.
All GVRP functions are disabled if the undo gvrp command is run in the system view.
